execution_results.query: List companies and their customer counts

sql_generation.sql: SELECT Company, COUNT(`Customer Id`) AS CustomerCount FROM customers_sample WHERE Company IS NOT NULL AND Company <> '' GROUP BY Company ORDER BY CustomerCount DESC LIMIT 100;

warnings: Column 'COUNT(`Customer Id`) AS CustomerCount' may not exist - consider specifying table
